intro: The code does not return the correct value. Try to figure out why.
Each word will contain a number (e.g ['somew4here', 'ov2er', 'th1e', 'rai3nbow']). This number is the position the word should have in the result.
Return the number of vowels in the given string.
Make a function that accepts 3 integer values a, b, c. The function should return true if a triangle can be built with the sides of given length and false in any other case.
Make a function that removes all vowels from a string.
Make a function that returns all whole divisors of any number, except for 1 and the number.
Make a function to flatten the values of an nested object to a simple array.
